      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Hur bor du? (Modul 4 - Safir)</string>
            <string language="en">How do you live? (module 4 - Safir)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie leben Sie? (Modul 4 - Safir)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment vivez-vous ? (module 4 - Safir)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como você vive? (módulo 4 - Safir)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come vivete? (modulo 4 - Safir)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς ζείτε; (ενότητα 4 - Safir)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo usted vive? (módulo 4 - Safir)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Bor du i en lägenhet eller kanske i ett eget hus? Vilket län bor du i? I Modul 4 lär du dig mera om hur och var du bor.</string>
            <string language="en">Do you live in an apartment or perhaps in an own house? Which county lives you in? In module 4 learns you you more about how and was you building.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">bostäder</string>
            <string language="sv">Sverige</string>
            <string language="en">Safir</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">languages</string>
            <string language="en">rooms</string>
            <string language="en">Sweden</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leben Sie in einer Wohnung oder möglicherweise 
in besitzen Haus? Welche Grafschaft lebt Sie innen? Im 
Modul erlernt 4 Sie Sie mehr über wie und war Sie Gebäude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Est-ce que vous vivez dans un appartement ou 
peut-être dans possédez la maison ? Quel comté vit vous 
dedans ? Dans le module 4 vous apprend vous davantage au sujet 
de la façon dont et était vous bâtiment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você vive em um apartamento ou talvez no possui 
a casa? Que condado vive você dentro? No módulo 4 
aprendem-no você mais sobre como e eram você edifício.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vivete in un appartamento o forse in possedete la
casa? Quale contea vive voi dentro? In modulo 4 li 
imparano voi di più circa come ed erano voi costruzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζείτε σε ένα διαμέρισμα ή ίσως σε ένα σπίτι; 
Ποιος νομός ζει εσείς μέσα; Στην ενότητα 4 σας 
μαθαίνουν εσείς περισσότερο για το πώς και ήταν εσύ που 
χτίζετε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Usted vive en un apartamento o quizás en posee 
la casa? ¿Qué condado vive usted adentro? En módulo 4 le
aprende usted más sobre cómo y eran usted edificio.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
